subject: No receipt received
description_text: Hello I placed an order under the name Jahnzaeb Khan I have yet to receive a email with a receipt.

conversations.body_text: Hi Baaz, Your order confirmation has been sent to the email address you provided: hollowprince1 @gmail.com Additionally, the PLUS X pedals are currently sold out at our U.S. warehouse. We have urgently arranged air freight and expect shipment on the 22nd, with an estimated delivery date around the 25th. We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience this may cause. We will prioritize addressing any follow-up questions you may have.
